Recommendations: Consider adding specific quantifiable achievements to the **work experience** section to highlight the impact of your contributions. Quantify accomplishments wherever possible to showcase tangible results.

While the summary is well-written, consider tailoring it to each specific job application to emphasize the most relevant skills and experiences. Customize your **summary** to match job descriptions for enhanced impact.

The resume lists certifications; enhance this section by specifying the issuing organization, completion date, and any associated achievements or skills gained. Providing more details on the **certifications** can add credibility.
While you included education details, formatting them consistently will improve readability. Clearly separate degrees, institutions, and graduation years for each entry in the **Education** Section.

If possible, consider adding details about **projects** you've worked on, even if they were academic projects. This can help showcase your abilities, especially if you have limited professional experience in some areas.

Include your proficiency with **ERP systems** such as **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**. Describe how you used these systems to manage inventory, track stock movement, and generate reports. Demonstrate your understanding of **ABC classification** and **EOQ** (Economic Order Quantity) by explaining how you used these methodologies to optimize inventory levels and reduce costs. Expand on your proficiency with **SQL** by highlighting specific instances where you used **SQL** to automate reporting, improve data accuracy, or perform complex data analysis. Mention using **SQL** for data warehousing and ETL processes in your skills section.

Quantify your achievements in developing **Power BI** dashboards and **Tableau** reports by specifying the percentage reduction in reporting time or the improvement in decision-making speed. Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of supply chain analytics, inventory management, and demand forecasting.

Inventory Planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Your Inventory
Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Master inventory management techniques to reduce costs, increase efficiency, and improve customer satisfaction.
A comprehensive guide to understanding inventory management principles and best practices.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn demand planning techniques, forecasting methods, and how to improve forecast accuracy.
Master time series forecasting and learn to apply various forecasting models using R.
An introduction to forecasting techniques and methods using Python.

E-commerce.COURSE_NAME: eCommerce Analytics: From Data to Decisions
E-commerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to analyze e-commerce data, optimize online sales, and improve customer experience.
Build and manage a successful Shopify store, optimize product listings, and drive online sales.
A beginner-friendly guide to understanding the fundamentals of e-commerce and online retail.

FOFO franchise.DESCRIPTION: Understand the principles of franchise management, operational strategies, and how to optimize franchise performance.
Learn the steps to start and manage a successful franchise business, from selection to operations.
An overview of the franchise business model and the key factors for success.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of NetSuite ERP, including modules for finance, supply chain, and CRM.
A hands-on guide to using NetSuite for business management, accounting, and operations.
Free tutorials covering various aspects of NetSuite, from basic setup to advanced configurations.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Master Zoho Inventory for managing stock levels, tracking shipments, and automating inventory processes.
A comprehensive course to learn Zoho Inventory from scratch and manage your business's inventory effectively.
Free tutorials to help you understand and use Zoho Inventory for inventory management.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Unicommerce for managing your e-commerce operations, inventory, and order fulfillment.
A beginner's guide to using Unicommerce for streamlining your e-commerce business processes.
Step-by-step tutorials on using Unicommerce for inventory management and order processing.

ERP systems.DESCRIPTION: Gain a foundational understanding of ERP systems, their modules, and how they integrate business processes.
Learn the key steps involved in implementing ERP systems, from planning to go-live and support.
A comprehensive overview of ERP systems, their benefits, and how they are used in businesses.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn different inventory management techniques including ABC classification and their practical applications.
Learn how to apply ABC analysis to prioritize inventory and improve inventory management.
A simple guide to understand and implement ABC analysis for effective inventory management.

EOQ.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: EOQ and Reorder Point
EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to calculate Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) and reorder point to optimize inventory levels.
A practical guide to understanding and using Economic Order Quantity to minimize inventory costs.
A clear explanation of Economic Order Quantity and how to calculate it for inventory management.

omnichannel inventory.DESCRIPTION: Understand the strategies and operations required to manage inventory effectively across all channels.
Learn how to build a successful omnichannel ecommerce strategy and optimize inventory management.
Key strategies to manage inventory for omnichannel retail and provide a seamless customer experience.
